comments.text:
IMO, marking something as an app tab means you want only one instance of it.

I use the bookmark toolbar for navigation. Every time I click "Twitter", it opens afresh, regardless of my pinned Twitter instance.

Either URL matching, or "you opened from a bookmark and pinned", or some other logic ought to (optionally?) apply.
